anms.training.partners.text3: example with support for adding, toggling, removing and filtering of the todo items.
anms.training.partners.text5: module and support for lazy loaded reducers (this is a lazy loaded feature module).
anms.training.partners.text6: Todos are persisted into local storage so you should see your partners also on later visits when using the same browser.
anms.training.how2work.title: Stock market
anms.training.how2work.description: Please provide some valid stock market symbol like:
anms.training.how2work.text1: Stock market example shows how to implement
anms.training.how2work.text4: Updating symbol query with different symbol will emit action which updates state with loading flag (reducer) and triggers effect for retrieving of selected stock.
anms.training.how2work.text5: Actions are debounced and every subsequent request will cancel previous one using
anms.training.how2work.text6: Success or error actions are emitted on request completion. Loading spinner is removed and stock info or error message is displayed.
anms.training.courses.parent.title: Theme scoping with nested components
anms.training.courses.parent.text1: Theme styles are not imported in component's
anms.training.courses.parent.text4: file. Because of this, theme styles are
anms.training.courses.parent.text9: selectors to prevent styles from leaking into child components. This can be achieved by using
anms.training.courses.parent.text10: in css rules to enhance their specificity. For example checkout theme file of this component:
anms.training.courses.child.title: child's h1
anms.training.courses.child.subtitle: should be without style
anms.training.auth.title: Authenticated component
anms.training.auth.description1: This component is only accessible for authenticated users
anms.training.auth.description2: Logging out will cause user to be redirected to home screen if visiting route accessible only to authenticated users
